thread.title: Need for Speed Soundtrack Revealed, Listen to it Now on Spotify
thread.title_full: Need for Speed Soundtrack Revealed, Listen to it Now on Spotify

author: Steve_OS
title: Need for Speed Soundtrack Revealed, Listen to it Now on Spotify
text: Need for Speed Soundtrack Revealed, Listen to it Now on Spotify 08:06 AM - October 14, 2015 by Steve_OS EA has revealed the Need for Speed soundtrack , which includes 61 artists from 16 different countries. Check out the track list below and listen to it on Spotify here . Aero Chord - Break Them feat. Anna Yvette Aero Chord - Surface Alison Wonderland - U Dont Know (feat. Wayne Coyne) AVICII - Pure Grinding Botnek - Here It Comes (N4S Mix) Botnek & 3LAU - Vikings Clement Marfo & The Frontline - Get Rowdy Congorock & Daddys Groove - Black Sun CP feat. Danny Cainco - Dont Stop Dimension - Move Faster Dirty South - The Unknown feat. FMLYBND Django Django - Shake And Tremble Doomtree - Gray Duck Drenge - We Can Do What We Want Fehrplay - Pyara (Live Edit) Flosstradamus - Dont Trip feat. Run The Jewels & Sizzy Rocket Genetikk - Wünsch Dir Was GoMad! & Monster feat. Matt Rose - Under Control GotSome - Vibe Out feat. Wiley HEALTH - NEW COKE Hook N Sling - Break Yourself feat. Far East Movement Hudson Mohawke - Brand New World iSHi feat. Pusha T - Push It Joywave - Destruction (KOPPS Remix) June Miller - Stormtrooper feat. Virus Syndicate Junior Prom - Stand! Kill The Noise - Lose Ya Love Krakota - Ice Hands Lokate - Flow (feat. Doctor & Bay C) Louis Berry - 25 Reasons
